name: Normal Day in Gym Class
description:
We made this game using p5.play for our Game Design 1 class.

Game Designers: itch.key, Rubidant, Kevin Joseph

Artist: Rubidant

Programmer: Kevin Joseph

Attributions:

Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/bumblebee-loop (Original by Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov Arranged and looped by Johan Brodd jobromedia)
